name: Tech Nightmare At The Museum
description:
https://github.com/sleprince/Point-Click-Adventure

This 3D point & click adventure game was made as the big personal project for Mastered games programmer bootcamp.

#scriptable-objects #navmesh #abstract-class #raycasting

Controls:

Right Mouse Button - change action type

Left Mouse Button - do action

TAB (hold down) - show all interactable objects

I - Inventory
